fer

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • fer.Map

  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Evan Stores the array of tiles that make up a map, along with properties and methods related to interfacing said map. Maps cannot be smaller than the amount of tiles required to fill the screen (15 by 10 tiles).

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init(GoalData[] goalData,
                 UnitData[] unitData)
        To be run after a map is selected in the menu, this method pulls all of the relevant data from the map's corresponding GoalData and UnitData messenger classes in order to initialize the map's faction map goals and units.
        Parameters:
        goalData - The array of GoalData messenger objects for the map
        unitData - The array of UnitData messenger objects for the map

      • checkVictory

        public int checkVictory()
        A method to be run after every in game action that cycles through each faction's goal to see if it is met. If a faction has met their goal, the index of said faction is returned. If no faction has met their goal, -1 is returned.
        Returns:
        The index of the first faction to complete their goal

      • resetUnitMovement

        public void resetUnitMovement()
        Sets all units on the map to a moveable state
